arts.ttl: Julian Nagelsmann addresses concerns ahead of Northern Ireland match
arts.sum: Julian Nagelsmann addressed concerns from media representatives regarding Germany’s performance ahead of the Northern Ireland qualifier.

arts.ttl: Preview: Can Nagelsmann steady the ship against confident Northern Ireland?
arts.sum: Germany’s World Cup qualifying campaign hits the Rhein-Energie-Stadion in Cologne under a cloud after an embarassing 2–0 defeat to Slovakia that left questions ringing around Julian Nagelsmann’s side. Northern Ireland, by contrast, arrive in Germany full of belief after opening Group A with a 3–1 victory over Luxembourg.

arts.ttl: Michael O’Neill excited by Northern Ireland’s ‘big step up’ against Germany
arts.sum: The challenging Group A World Cup qualifier tie takes place in Cologne on Sunday.
